name: zuna-xosokeno
description: Xổ số Keno MERN Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install

author: Zuna Team
